name: Cube Cave
description:
Press full screen to run the game

This is my first game. It's a small minigame where you have to press the B, N, M keys in the right timing.

  • B - under a orange crystal(cube)
  • N - under a green crystal
  • M - under a blue crystal

Music coming soon

I'm still new to Unity, so the game isn't really good.

If you have any ideas for the game please let me know in the comments section.

Well i hope you like the game and good luck.

Thank you.
